name: Golden Rose Hotel by THG
address: 56 Loseby Phường An Hải Bắc, Quận Sơn Trà, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Đà Nẵng, cách Bãi biển Mỹ Khê 7 phút đi bộ, Golden Rose Hotel by THG cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có phòng chờ chung, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí và nhà hàng. Khách sạn 4 sao này có dịch vụ tiền sảnh và bàn bán tour. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Tất cả các căn tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Tại Golden Rose Hotel by THG, tất cả các phòng đều có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ cách Cầu sông Hàn 1.9 km và Cầu khóa Tình yêu Đà Nẵng 2.6 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách Golden Rose Hotel by THG 6 km.

review.comment_positive: Beautiful room, 24/7 staff availability, great location. Comfortable bed.
review.comment_negative:
Room was not well maintained. 

A lot of things were just falling apart a little bit. A lot of the cabinet handles were slightly broken (loose), the showerhead holder was coming off, the room card key holder (to maintain power) also kept falling down. 

My first room had weird permanent stains, and black fungus/mold on the bathroom lining. 

Shower water only goes up to lukewarm (not warm or hot). This was true for both rooms I stayed in.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Mixed review for this hotel.
Spent 3nites here, two nights in the cheapest room and 1 night in the deluxe king as we extended. Definitely spend the extra few dollars on a deluxe room, much better decor and a view to the city.

The good:
*Great location near the beach.
*Big shower with good pressure
*Comfortable bed
*Reasonable pricing
review.comment_negative:
Needs improvement:
* After we checked out and paid, they cancelled my reservation via booking.com. This is dodgy as they then don't pay commission to the agent, but it also cancelled my cashback and rewards.
*First room looked like it needed a deep clean, dirty shelves that were dusty and the bathroom plug was dirty

review.rating: Nice no-frills hotel with a modern interior and good service.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Nice hotel close to the beach in a super chill neighbourhood, convenience store across the street, about a dozen coffee places in the surrounding streets, a nice Banh My lady on a corner close by (one of the best Banh My I've had in  Vietnam so far). 

The coffee place a few houses over servers a nice breakfast and it's a 5 minute walk to a more bustling area with tons of restaurants and bars. Or you can head to the beach, which also has many places to drink or eat. 

The hotel itself is nice and clean, has a good shower and a modern interior. The ac keeps the room nice and cool, and it's quiet when you try to sleep.

Housekeeping gives you water and fresh towels, even if you don't want your room made up, which is a nice touch. 

You can leave your bag if you want to spend the day on the beach after checking out.
review.comment_negative: Not a negative for this hotel! Just make sure you don't try and check into Golden Rose II or Golden Rose III in the same street. (they look exactly the same, like the only reason I knew is that my keycard didn't work on the door..)

review.comment_positive: Facilities are quite new and beautiful. Staffs are so nice and friendly and bring up good service. Checkin time and go out/return time is flexible. There is also motorbike rental service.
review.comment_negative:
Firstly, I booked 4 sea view room but we can't see any piece of sea here. I asked one staff about it but the answer is just let me check. I wouldn't be upset if it didn't claimed as 'beachfront' and 'sea view'.
Secondly, the soundproofing system is very poor. I can hear everything from the next room and the hall's conversations.
Thirdly, the hotel claimed itself as 4-star service but the service is quite more like 3-star. Shampoo and shower gel are outdated. And the hotel also claimed as beachfront but it wasn't. More like 500m from the beach. You can see its location on Google Maps.
And the lacking of some important stuffs here, for example it doesn't have "Do not disturb" sign outside the room door. The cleaning staff knocked on my door in the morning and disturbed my sleep. I'm not sure if the water is clean but 3/8 persons in my group got itchy after shower.

See you soon my friends !

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Địa điểm khách sạn gần biển
review.comment_negative:
Gia đình chúng tôi lần đầu đến Đà Nẵng vì tin đánh giá trên Booking.com nên đã đặt khách sạn này và đã có một TRẢI NGHIỆM THỰC TẾ RẤT TỒI TỆ 🤬
- Đặt phòng trước gần 1 tuần trên Booking.com không yêu cầu thanh toán trước nhưng tôi đã gọi cho khách sạn để xác nhận mã đặt phòng họ xác nhận là CÓ!!! Đến 8h sáng ngày tôi đặt phòng khách sạn gọi báo hủy phòng vì sự cố điện. Sau đó 2 tiếng khách sạn gọi lại cho tôi nói đã khắc phục sự cố và nhận khách trở lại. Yêu cầu tôi đặt cọc tôi nhanh chóng chuyển tiền => kết quả đến nơi lễ tân báo hết phòng như tôi đã đặt 🙄 
- Đến nơi hành lý cũng nhiều và có trẻ em nữa nên mình nhờ lễ tân gọi người giúp đưa hành lý lên phòng bạn lễ tân trả lời KHÔNG CHỊ TỰ CHUYỂN HÀNH LÝ lên phòng 🥴 
- Phòng rất bẩn ! 
❗️Hãy cân nhắc kĩ trước khi đặt phòng ở khách sạn này

review.comment_positive: Els llits eren molt còmodes i l'habitació estava equipada amb tot allò necessari. La dutxa és una meravella i el bany era idílic. L'hotel està molt ben situat a 3 minuts caminant de la platja i te servei de lavanderia i per llogar motos a 150.000 VND/dia (6€). Poder llogar la moto a l'allotjament està molt bé perquè Da Nang és una ciutat molt allargada on és imprescindible per poder moure's còmodament i a baix preu
review.comment_negative: Els vam demanar que ens netejaren l'habitació, ja que havíem tornat de la platja i hi havia molta sorra, i no ens la van netejar

review.comment_positive:

review.comment_negative:
The blinds do are semi-sheer and don’t cover the full window, so do not block the sun effectively at all in the morning. 
There’s no on-site restaurant at all - not a major issue as there are nice cafes just down the road, but something to be aware of (in-room information booklets refer to a restaurant in the hotel but this is incorrect/outdated)

review.comment_positive: The hotel is nicely located near the beach and restaurants, making it quite convenient. The room was comfy and spacious, with good beds and reliable AC. The view from the 10th floor was impressive. Cleaning is available upon request but you do get your towels changed daily which is great.
review.comment_negative: We faced challenges with inconsistent WiFi and hit-or-miss hot water, which would have been great after getting drenched outside and needing to warm up. The rooms appeared more dated than expected from the pictures but nothing major to mention.

review.comment_positive: I stayed here for about a week and loved it! It is such incredible value for money. The rooms were perfectly comfortable and even had views over the city and out to the beach. It’s an easy 5 minute walk to the beach and is in a nice quieter area of Da Nang with lovely cafes and restaurants around. The hustle and bustle of the tourist area is still very accessible by 5mins walking!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: - Chị nhân viên làm ở tầng ăn sáng rất nhiệt tình.
review.comment_negative:
- Mình đặt phòng gia đình 2 phòng ngủ thông nhau nhưng nhận phòng thì cửa thông đã bị chặn lại. Kết quả là phải ở 2 phòng riêng biệt 
- Nút bấm thang máy tầng mình ở bị liệt ( tầng 8 ) 
- Rèm cửa nhà vệ sinh lại lắp bên ngoài ??? không có 1 chút riêng tư khi đi tắm và vệ sinh 
- 9h30 sáng mình có thuê 1 chiếc xe số với giá 120k/1 ngày và được nhận 1 chiếc sirius odo trên 5 vạn, phuộc nhún đã lỗi, kim loại toàn xe đã bị rỉ sét nặng, vỏ nhựa của xe sắp rụng ra ngoài. Đi 40km/h bị sàn lắc. Mình chỉ đi ăn rồi đi về luôn vì xe quá tệ. 
- Ban đầu mình đặt qua booking là 1 ngày, nhưng có việc đột xuất nên phải ở Đà Nẵng thêm 1 ngày. 
9h30 sáng mình đã xuống lễ tân để đặt phòng ở thêm 1 ngày nữa. Sau khi lễ tân kiểm tra lịch đặt phòng trên hệ thống thì đã đồng ý để mình được ở thêm. NHƯNG 12h30 mình đang ngủ trưa thì lễ tân gọi mình và yêu cầu phải trả phòng với lí do có tour đặt phòng này. Mình hỏi lại có hướng giải quyết gì không? Chẳng hạn như đổi sang phòng khác cho đỡ mất thời gian thì lễ tân trả lời hôm nay khách sạn full phòng. 
Rất mất thời gian và tiền bạc của mình khi đang giữa trưa phải dậy dọn đồ, tìm khách sạn khác cũng như tiền taxi di chuyển. 
- Mình đặt qua booking với giá gần 900k nhưng khi xuống checkout thì nhân viên báo 1tr8 ? 
Lại một lần nữa lễ tân làm mình rất stress cũng như thiếu chuyên nghiệp, nhất là vấn để về tiền bạc. 
Kết luận mình và người thân sẽ không bao giờ quay lại đây nữa.

review.comment_positive: Rooms were a good size with good air conditioning and it was cheap for 2 nights.
review.comment_negative: Rooms looked a bit tired with marks and stains, did not look much like the photos at all. The staff, while okay, were not very welcoming at all. We received no information at all other than how much we owed for the room. Although they say they take cash or card we were strongly encouraged to pay by cash even when we said we would prefer to pay with card. Staff spoke enough English to get by for checkin etc but not much more than this. Although breakfast wasn’t included in our booking, nothing was mentioned about the option to pay for this upon checking in and no information was given about good locations in Danang or good things to do there. Overall you pay for what you get but I would say maybe worth paying a bit more for more helpful and welcoming staff.

review.rating: Great Stay In A More Relaxed Area Of Da Nang
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The night shift receptionist was really cool and welcoming, he greeted me with a warm smile. The rest of the staff as well, as the 2 girls during the day shift, made me feel at home. The room itself was big enough, with good lighting throughout, a comfortable bed, and pillows. The rug in the room was a nice touch. The TV was great with plenty of English channels and the wifi was good. The bathroom was spacious, loved the walk-in shower. The location itself was great, away from the busy area of Da Nang, but a short walk to a much more chill side of the beach, not as crowded. The hotel was surrounded by cafes and mini-marts, my favorite cafe was Woods Coffee, just a 3 min walk away. There was also a nice park nearby to go for a walk or run, overall, the location ended up being awesome. The busier area with western bars, pubs, and restaurants, was about a 10-15 min grab bike away.
review.comment_negative: The only thing I didn't like was upon arrival, my room was not fully cleaned, but afterward, it was not an issue and housekeeping did a great job making sure everything was cleaned and stocked. The room felt a bit dated but was comfortable as mentioned above.

review.rating: The best hotel in Da Nang!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
This was the best place we have stayed in Vietnam so far. 

1. Amazing, friendly, English-speaking staff. Very accommodating and kind. 

2. The cleanest rooms we have seen so far. Beautiful decor too. Lots of good lighting and mirrors. 

3. There is a garage to store your motorbike with an attendant who keeps watch. 

4. Laundry service (expensive) but a nice option to have. 

5. Our rooms were made up daily. The bedsheets and towels were very clean. 

6. The AC worked perfectly. There was a mini fridge stocked with drinks which was very nice. 

7. The location is very good, close to the breach and mini mart, close to restaurants.
review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately the room we stayed in looked NOTHING like the photos. It was still clean, white bedding and grey flooring, but it does not look like the pictures. It is much more modern, which we actually preferred, but be warned that the photos are not like how the room looks. 

The bathroom door handle was broken, and the shower door did not close so water would spray across the bathroom floor. 

There is a “sister hotel” (Golden Rose 2) down the street, so be careful of entering the wrong hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Good location,  friendly staff and affordable price. A few minutes walking to the beach, grocery stores, café and restaurants.
review.comment_negative: No good maintenance of the room facilities. One wall light and the bathroom sink were broken, but no big influence on my stay. The room floor and slippers were dirty and covered with some sand. There were some tiny stains on the bed sheets and blanket covers, which made us feel very uncomfortable. A little safety concern is that at least two grab couriers knocked our room door by mistake at night, which made me feel very anxious. To my surprise, the corridor of the hotel is totally dark at night, so it's very inconvenient for the guests to leave in the early morning.

review.rating: una vergüenza la atención del hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: la habitación es bonita, pero la estadía un desastre, robos, suciedad y mala atención
review.comment_negative: que me robaron los lentes, el primer día que deje los lentes solo estiraron la cama, tampoco pusieron papel higiénico, hice el reclamo y los de recepción y querían hacerse cargo devolviendo mi estancia y valor de anteojos pero cuando se los menciones rebajándolos 50% por por el uso no supieron q hacer, lleve a los de recepción para q vieran q no hicieron nada, me dieron numero de gerente del hotel y fue una verdadera vergüenza su atención, al otro día salí y pedí explícitamente que limpiaran habitación y no lo hicieron, me dicen que limpiaran al otro día que era el que me iba, ademas se supone que por Booking.com el pago era por adelantado y tuve q pagar igual en el hotel, he viajado por muchos lugares, inclusive quedándome en hostales compartiendo alojamiento y es primera vez q me roban, cuando hago el check aut me querían cobrar la sopa preparada que estaba donde está el hervidor y se supone que es lo que es gratis, le menciono a la recepcionista y me pide disculpas, hay muchos hoteles en la zona no elijan este , una cosa es q se les pase limpiar y otra q el día q limpiaran solo recogieran la cama donde tampoco limpiaron mi coleta y estaba debajo de la almohada que lo mostré pero así no se hicieron responsables del robo, pero llamar q la policía cosa que le dijeron q llegaría en 30 minutos, cuando le digo a la gerente x whatsap me dice que debo llamarla yo, sabiendo que no se habla el idioma, realmente una vergüenza

review.comment_positive: The Golden Rose was incredible value for money. We paid off season rates that were almost the same as a grubby backpackers. We had an amazing time. There was a kettle, cable TV, a spacious and clean room. Fantastic value. Cannot fault our stay.

review.comment_positive: I liked the room, confortable bed, clean.
review.comment_negative:
⛔️ The fact that the housekeeping team woke me when they started to clean the rooms, i was still in bed and they were so loud, talking with eachother. At some point one of them tried to enter into my room, without knocking or asking anything, i heard the noise and i screamed: heelloo! So she stopped. After a few minutes a housekeeper did exactly the same thing, without saying anything or knocking at the door. She just entered into my room! She said sorry and she left but i really find it disturbing and i didn't liked it.

⛔️ The level of english from the front desk personal was veeery poor. The comunication was pretty difficult.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Unser Aufenthalt im "GOLDEN Rose Hotel" war super, wir hatten unser Zimmer in der 9.Etage und durch das riesen Fenster, direkt neben dem Bett hatten wir einen herrlichen Ausblick auf den Strand von Da Nang.
Mit diesem Ausblick schläft man gerne ein und wacht noch lieber auf. 🤩
Apropos schlafen, die Matratze war super bequem.

Die Koffer konnten wir vor Check-In und nach dem Check-Out in der Lobby abstellen.

Die Lage ist super, es sind ca 300m bis zum Strand von Da Nang.
review.comment_negative:
Einige Kleinigkeiten haben den Gesamteindruck etwas getrübt. 

Zum einen gab es einen Aufsteller das Kreditkartezahlung möglich ist, allerdings war bei Check Out und Bezahlung das Gerät kaputt, so dass ich noch schnell Geld besorgen musste.
Eine kurze Info vorab wahre hilfreich und wünschenswert gewesen 

Im Badezimmer war die Toilette etwas angelaufen, dass die auf den ersten Blick etwas schmutzig wirkt.

review.rating: 性价比很高的经济型酒店
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: 性价比非常高的便捷酒店。这个酒店的位置比较偏离市中心，但是周边餐饮超市咖啡馆一应俱全，而且有各种风味的餐厅。步行300米左右就是海边，散步相当方便。酒店价格非常便宜，提供的住宿条件相对也比较超值。如果长期入住还是很划算的。酒店附近就有洗衣服务，20000盾一公斤，也很便宜便捷。酒店有提供去巴拿山的旅行服务，只比门票贵了70000盾，其实就是多一个免费接送服务，玩可以自己随便玩。
review.comment_negative: 酒店卫生条件一般，有的时候会忘记给你清理房间，需要提醒。另外酒店不主动提供洗发水和沐浴露，我是自己准备的。注意的话酒店里会有小虫小蚂蚁在爬，不过这种一般在东南亚的廉价酒店难以避免，不是高度洁癖的可以无视。

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Большой номер за смешные деньги. Персонал отзывчивый, претензий нет, помогали по мере сил.   Рядом с отелем несколько замечательных кофеен и пара супермаркетов. До пляжа рукой подать. Много ресторанов с морепродуктами, по ценам вроде не дорого.  Самое забавное, что на этой улице есть клон этого отеля, абсолютно идентичный, то есть совершенно такой же, и мне даже казалось, что на ресепшенах в них  сидят двойники или  близнецы, ну типо такая шутка от владельцев...
review.comment_negative: Видно что отель немного подустал и очень хочет наконец освежится. С другой стороны цена за номер была такой приятной а вид из окна таким замечательным, что ни раздолбанный душ ни странный слив в полу от которого чуть не затапливало прихожую ни сломанная штора не повлияли на мое настроение и  не помешали мне наслаждаться прекрасным Данангом.

review.comment_positive: I liked the comfort of the bed. I liked that it was close to the beach; about a 5-7 min walk.
review.comment_negative: unfortunately there were quite a few things that upset me about the property. my room had a cracked mirror, the bidet in the bathroom was leaking and I asked it to be checked multiple times, and the sheets had blood stains on them. I booked this place due to the restaurant, free foot massage and the fact that you could exchange money on the property. none of those things were true. The front desk person said the restaurant was closed for renovations, and when I asked about currency she directed me to a place off site so I had to pay for a grab to do so, as it was a 30 plus minute walk. When I asked about the foot massage and showed her the pictures from booking website she said it was 2 months ago, and I let her know it was still showing as of now. I am a bit disappointed by the fact these things were not accurate. when I checked in I paid cash for the room and upon checkout they tried to get me to pay again and it was an ordeal. it was finally resolved but I’m grateful I only had a couple days here.

Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Situated close to the beach area of Da Nang (5 walk mins to the sea) this is a good value hotel with slightly faded "glamour" and a deserted and closed up restauarant on its top floor. The staff were pleasant and helpful, and the room large and comfortable, if unremarkable. Completely modern Western in style, but everything in the room worked well- TV, shower, fridge etc., with no surprises other than the extremely good value.

review.comment_positive:
We booked a Premium double room with sea view and breakfast.  While the room is lovely and the bed very very comfortable I was disappointed that the sea view was found only if you pop your head out the window and look right.
When we checked in, we were told there was no breakfast available (restaurant not open? I don't know) and we could get a refund for the breakfast part on our checking out.  As this was a pay when you check in situation, I still paid the full booking fee but did not receive any refund.   The room was great value for what I did pay but I was just a little disappointed about my first night and morning in Da Nang.  Staff are friendly and helpful.
review.comment_negative:
If the restaurant is no longer in operation, please advise where we could go for breakfast the next morning.  Better still, don't advertise breakfast is included when the restaurant is not operational.  I wanted a hotel room with breakfast.  
Sea view is not quite accurate.

review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, vị trí thuận tiện
review.comment_negative: Lúc nhận phòng thì phòng mình chưa có set khăn tắm, khăn mặt. Mình có gọi nhân viên lễ tân, nhưng ba người nhận được 1 bộ. Đặt phòng không phải thanh toán phòng trước, nhưng vì khách sạn có nhắn là vì dịp lễ đông khách nên cần đặt trước 30%, mình nhận tin nhắn qua booking và gọi điện check với khách sạn về nội dung tin nhắn trước khi chuyển khoản, và chuyển khoản, cũng như thông báo khoảng thời gian sẽ tới checkin nhận phòng. Tuy nhiên tới gần trưa ngày nhận phòng khách sạn lại gọi điện hỏi xác nhận m có đến nhận phòng không, và yêu cầu mình cọc đặt trước 50% . M không rõ do khách sạn làm việc cẩn thận nên cần kiểm tra lại nhiều lần, hay do các nhân viên của khách sạn chưa thông tin đầy đủ với nhau về nội dung của khách hàng, nhưng m không thích điều đó.

review.comment_negative: The room was very dirty. There were stains on the table, it is super easy to clean those, I don’t understand how could a person not notice them while cleaning the room. It seemed as they didn’t clean my room before I checked in at all. The blankets were all in stains as well. The toilet was old and dirty. Everything from the corridor can be heard in the room. I know that the hotel is not responsible for that but some random people were arguing and fighting in the corridor at night. They were shouting at each other, I could even hear them through my earplugs. I was really scared as I also heard hitting sounds and banging on the doors. The stay at Golden Rose hotel was a nightmare. Do not recommend!

review.comment_positive: The shower - it was hot with great pressure. The beds - large and comfortable. The location - near the beach, near the city centre, plenty to see and do nearby. The air-conditioning - it went as low as 16° Celsius and cooled the room quickly. The price - we paid around €40 for three nights. It was comfortable and clean and staff messaged me to see if there was anything that they could help with. I would stay here again as it was great value for money.
review.comment_negative: The photos are quite misleading - there's no restaurant. Our room was like one of the bedrooms pictured further down the listing, with the grey headboards. It was lovely and comfortable and clean but maybe don't expect one of the bigger looking rooms unless you specifically ask and pay for them. It was very noisy in the mornings but I did address this with staff and they said they would sort it, unfortunately I was checking out early the next morning so I didn't get to see the benefits of this! They keep your passport at reception - this didn't bother me but I know some people don't like this so just a word of warning.

review.rating: Mediocre accommodation for a reasonable price
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: This accommodation was for a reasonable price, the sheets were washed, and the room was cleaned up. However, these are rather basic requirements than anything extraordinary.
review.comment_negative: In my first room, I discovered some clothes moths flying around. However, they promptly changed my room based on my complaint. Nevertheless, the second room felt little bit damp on the contrary. The shower cubicle was not properly sealed so there was a lot of water in the whole bathroom after my first shower. Overall, the room felt worn out and smudged. To me, this was the least pleasant accommodation within my Vietnam trip.

review.rating:
Eine preisgünstige, gute 
Unterkunft für Leute, die das Urlaubsgeld lieber für andere Dinge ausgeben
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
review.comment_positive:
Das Personal war ausgesprochen freundlich und hilfsbereit. 
- Der Wäscheservice war zuverlässig und preiswert. 
- Die Zimmer waren sauber und groß.
- Auch das Badezimmer war großzügig geschnitten und sehr bequem mit begehbarer Dusche.
- Die Unterkunft liegt günstig, diverse Restaurants, kleiner Supermarkt, Geldwechsel, alles da.
- Zum 30 km langen Sandstrand von Da Nang sind es fünf Minuten Fußweg. 
- Eine Taxistation ist direkt vor dem Hotel..
- Wir wollten ursprünglich die Unterkunft noch einmal wechseln, haben uns aber aufgrund des sensationellen Preis-Leistungsverhältnisses entschieden, unseren gesamten Urlaub dort zu verbringen. 
- Wir hatten 2 Doppelzimmer zur Alleinnutzung. Die Preise werden hier  in der Regel pro Zimmer und nicht pro Person ausgewiesen.
review.comment_negative:
Der gebuchte Meerblick entsprach nicht ganz den Erwartungen, aber das war nicht wirklich schlimm. Nach 5 Minuten Fußweg ist man am Strand. Wer braucht da schon Meerblick im Zimmer?

- Den nächsten mit meiner VISA Card funktionierenden Geldautomaten musste ich etwas länger suchen. Hier fragt man am besten andere Urlauber, wo welche Kreditkarte funktioniert.

Very good value for money overall, especially with room promotion.

review.rating: Very value for money, safe area, near the beach, very helpful staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The pictures of the rooms are accurate and although there is some wear and tear and it is not sparkling clean but for me that was not a problem. The location is very close to the beach and the beds are comfortable. You get new towels and water every day and the hotel also has shampoo and shower gel that smell really nice !!! There is a kettle and also a mini fridge. The instant noodles and mini fridge are paid for at check out but the prices are very normal and written on the menu. The staff was so so nice! They kept my bags for me after check out and when I wanted to print my boarding pass and their printer was broken, they went out of their way, to different stores around the area to help me print it. I recommend this hotel :)

review.comment_negative:
đặt phòng có bồn tắm nhưng khi nhận
phòng lại không có. Phòng mình được
vặn nước vòi tắm bị hỏng mình xuống
nói nhưng vì 23:00 tối nên phải đợi đến 
ngày sau mới được chuyển (tạm thời )
qua phòng khắc để tắm 😂 buồn cười 
dã man cái hotel này 🤣 mình ở phòng 
916 đang ngủ trưa thì khách bên phòng
915 mở cửa qua phòng mình trong khi 
cửa chính đóng mà khách thuê phòng
bên cạnh lại có thể tự mở cửa vào 
phòng mình 🤣 thật sự rất sợ và rất 
không ổn. tôi thề là sẽ không về lại
hotel này nữa!

review.comment_positive:
ビーチまで歩いて10分もかからなかった。
静かだった。
コンビニらしきお店もすぐ近くにある。
あまり良くはないけど安いマッサージ屋さんなんかもすぐそばにある。
私は英語ができないけど、スタッフさん達はきちんと対応してくれた。
review.comment_negative:
部屋にあるセーフティボックスが最初からロックされてて使えなかった。お客さんを入れる前に確認しないといけないでしょうね。
すごく小さいアリがたくさんいた。実害は無かったけど、気分の良いものではないですよね。

Wir mussten auch nach Handtüchern fragen, da unsere ersatzlos verschwunden waren.
Der Service ist für ein Hotel dieses Standards leider nicht optimal.

review.comment_positive: Not a lot
review.comment_negative: Just about everything from start to finish.After booking the hotel I was made to pay straight away without even seeing or even in Danang.couldnt pay by Debit card had to get hotel in Hanoi to mat a bank transfer which cost me more. When I arrived greeted by 2 teenagers who couldn't speak a word of English, room I was put in was not what I had booked was told the were fully booked finally next day moved to room booked but think I would have been better off in backpackers. Room in need of some serious maintenance shower not working, toilet seat broken,sink plug not working and covered in rust. Room not cleaned everyday and one day when it was cleaned door left wide open so anyone could have walked in. Reception staff to busy playing on Mobil phones to even acknowledge you as you entered or left the hotel. All inall the worst hotel I've stayed In THANKS

review.comment_negative: Không tôn trọng khách hàng. Mình có đi Hội An chơi và không ở khách sạn 2 ngày 2 đêm. Lễ tân nhắn tin qua zalo kêu mình ghé quầy thanh toán, mình đang ở Hội An nên có nhắn lại là tối về ghé quầy và có hỏi số tiền thì nhân viên kêu ghé quầy mới tính. Chơi đến khuya nên mình ở lại tới sáng mai mới về, vậy mà sáng 8h sáng có người bên ks gọi mình hỏi mình có ở thêm không và mình đã bảo không và mình sẽ qua để thanh toán. Bạn lễ tân thì 7h sáng nhắn tin zalo kêu chuyển khoản và gửi số tiền qua. Vậy sao lúc đầu mình hỏi bạn bao nhiêu tiền bạn không nói luôn đi, lươn lẹo thực sự. Chưa hết tức, giờ check out là 12h nhưng 12h kém mình tới thì thẻ phòng đã bị vô hiệu hoá không vào được, và vali thêm đồ của mình trong phòng đã bị đưa xuống sảnh, còn tự ý vứt đồ của khách, mình đã ở đây 2 tháng từ khi du lịch Đà Nẵng, sau vụ này thì mình xin phép cho chim cút luôn. Bỏ mấy chục triệu ở ks như này đúng là t gặp tam tai mới đạp trúng phải KS như này. Phòng thì mùi cống bốc lên nồng nặc, điều hoà rỉ nước, cửa thì không cần thẻ từ vẫn vào được.

review.comment_positive: Absolument tout ! Le prix d'abord, absolument imbattable pour un établissement de cette qualité avec un tel emplacement. En plein centre et front de mer. Les chambres : spacieuses, avec une jolie salle de bain, très propres. La piscine en rooftop avec vue mer. Très agréable. La salle de gym, incroyablement bien équipée pour un établissement de ce prix. Il y avait même un fauteuil de massages automatique très performant et gratuit ! Le service, très bien accueilli par Sun et son équipe. Le propriétaire très disponible et à l'écoute. J'ai adoré !

review.comment_negative:
ファミリールームを予約したのに、画像と違う部屋を案内されました。しかも下水臭くてとてもではないですが過ごせるかんじではありません。
？？と思って呼んだら、まさかのドレッサーで封鎖されたドアが出現して二つの部屋が繋がれていて、そこを押してあげて二つの部屋がつながりました。

写真はとても綺麗に見えますが、写真と現実は違います。Instagramと実際の違いくらい違います。海はこんなに綺麗に全く見えないし、一つ一つの家具がなんとなく豪華っぽいだけですごく安っぽいです。
なんたって下水臭くて、布団が湿っていました。
カビが多かったのか、アレルギーが止まりませんでした。

最初に案内された部屋は特に下水臭すぎて全く使わず、ファミリールームを予約した意味がないです。

review.comment_positive:
Attention everybody !!!
I had booked for 3 nights in this hotel and i checked in early so i paid 800000VND including 150k vnd for early check-in.The moment i entered the room there was a open condom in the drawer.The vibe is not that much good .Staff were nice but not cooperative.The AC wasn't working properly neither wifi, So I checked out the next day.Once I checked out they cancelled my booking when i told i texted the property that I'm gonna give you bad review for sure.As a customer you should always have the liberty to give your feedback.There isn't any vibe at all it's like crazy man.When I contacted booking.com even they are not sure whether they gonna retrieve my booking or not crazy.So even i lost trust on booking.com as i felt somewhat they never care for valuable customers concern and that really hit me hard.Anyway I might take legal actions on booking.com by embarrassing them on national media nad twitter that would be fun.
Even now my booking isn't retrieved just imagine.😂

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive:
Ruime goede kamer met gedeeltelijk uitzicht op de zee.
goede douche, tv en airco. Er is goed gebruik van gemaakt en dat kan je best goed zien. Er stonden twee bedden. De iets grotere was gewoon goed en stond naast het raam dat ook open kon. Ik verbleef hier bijna twee weken en voelde me veilig en comfortabel in dit hotel. De schoonmaak is ook ok. Het beste is om aan te geven wat je wilt van hun. Ik wilde niet elke dag nieuwe lakens bijvoorbeeld. Vaak waren de twee flesjes water en twee schone handdoeken al genoeg. Receptionisten zeer vriendelijk en bleken elke dag beter Engels te gaan spreken! Al met al een goede tijd gehad en kijk er daarom naar uit om in de toekomst weer in mijn kamertje te mogen verblijven. 
De laundry service is goed en je was ruikt gelukkig lekker neutraal na retour ( 30K/kilo).  
De lobby is echt grappig om te zien 🇻🇳
review.comment_negative: goede vraag want de prijs/kwaliteit verhouding was in februari 2023 gewoon goed. Je moet je indrukken soms ook de tijd geven en vaak lossen ze zich dan vanzelf op.

Đặc biệt là nệm nằm ngủ cực kỳ ngon giấc, ko bị lún và sột soạt lúc trở mình. Còn giá thì quá rẻ so với chất lượng phòng và dịch vụ. Chắc chắn 100% những lần tới mình vẫn sẽ book phòng ở đây 💯💯💯

review.comment_positive: Цена. За столь малую сумму всеже номер с нормальным санузлом, и постелью, чтобы переночевать.
review.comment_negative: Заселили в плохо убранный после предыдущих жильцов номер, на полу были волосы. Полотенца тонкие и с пятнами, на постельном белье тоже пятна. Мебель ещё выглядит хорошо, но обои на стенах местами начинают отклеиваться. Работал один лифт из двух, который отказывался ехать вниз несколько раз. Когда попросили сейф, персонал не понят просьбу.

review.comment_positive: Fantastic Reception/Ground Floor Area! Nice, very clean room with more than enough of new furniture, plenty of drawers, shelves. Comfortable beds! Modern, very clean bathroom with rain shower head, hairdryer, Big mirror, in fact several mirrors. Minibar. Good size TV with 60 channels but less than perfect picture quality. Large, clean window with real view. Excellent wi-fi signal. Lift, like no other. Very friendly staff especially that Sweet Girl (Mylili?) at the Reception. Again, more than nice Reception area. Good location, quiet street. Simple restaurant (not bad) next to the hotel and mini-marts just 1 minute walk. Close to the beach. Good location. Accept bank cards (even international) payment. For what you pay I would give 11
review.comment_negative: Keep your passport and you pay when checking-out. Nowhere to put soap or shampoo in shower enclosure, only on the floor. No A/C remote control, you can only set/change it on the wall, so if too cool/warm at night, get out of your bed, walk to the door, change settings, back to bed. Would be nice to have bath mat to step on when you leave shower enclosure. No coffee/tea sachets but free water and there is electric kettle.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Thích cái sảnh nhìn thì có vẻ sang xịn mịn
review.comment_negative:
Thứ nhất là về phòng: đơn điệu hẹp so với 3 sao thì chưa đạt
Thứ 2 về tiện ích: Chỉ có 2 chai nước suối mỗi ngày, ko trà ko cà phê ko mì gói..., phòng tắm chỉ có 1 loại khăn, có sữa tắm dầu gội và bàn chải lược...( so với chỗ khác còn có dao cạo, mũ tắm, tăm bông...) nói chung so với phòng 3 sao khác thì mình thấy 3 sao này ko tiện nghi. 
Thứ 3 về phục vụ dọn phòng: 
- mình rất ko hài lòng với cách dọn phòng ở đây, mình ở 3 đêm, lúc bạn đến dọn mình nói ko cần xếp chăn vì mình còn đang dùng, bạn vào thay khăn xong đi ra ko làm gì khác để gọi là dọn phòng
- mình dùng ly của ks để pha cafe gói mình đem để uống, uống xong để đó chưa rửa cũng ko có nhu cầu nhờ ks rửa luôn đâu, nhưng bạn dọn phòng đem nguyên ly chưa rửa úp ngược vào khây :)))
